CVA.notes: Heavy Carrier. Fighters are F14s (8) and A10s (7); see (302.352). Can never be converted to use A20s due to balcony.

SCS.notes: Space Control Ship Fighters (302.352) are threesquadrons: F14 (8), F18 (6), A20 (10).

CVL.notes: Medium Carrier, Single Ship Carrier, Scout; (4EW:2AF)(1EW:6AF)

CVB.notes: Medium Carrier; 6 fighter factors until Y172; (302.352). No early variants.

CVBv.2.notes: Medium Carrier; 6 fighter factors until Y172; (302.352). No early variants.

BP+.notes: Heavy Battle Pod; max 3 in service.

VP.notes: Medium Carrier pod; max 3 in service.

VAP+.notes: Heavy carrier pod (heavy pod), max 3 in service.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

BATSv.2.notes: Battlestation. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits: 2 FTM or one FTM +1 PFM.

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

CV.notes: Heavy True Carrier; single oversized squadron. Treated as Medium Carrier (interdiction) from Y176 onward.

UH.notes: Medium True Carrier; one oversized squadron.

VP.notes: Carrier Pallet for tug or LTT; max 2 in service.

PFP.notes: PF Tender Pallet; Scout; (EW=2); max 2 in service.

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

CL.notes: Base Hull Type (CL) § Only one CL or DD per turn can be subbed for a CM.

BP.notes: Battle pod (has drone bombardment capability); limit 4.

DD.notes: Base Hull Type (DD); heavy ad hoc escort. § Only one CL or DD per turn can be subbed for a CM.

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

VP+.notes: Medium Carrier Pallet, Max 2 in service, Tugs only

PFP+.notes: PFT Pallet (tug only), max 2 in service, Scout, (2EW:2AF)(1EW:TugAF)

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

SBv.2.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

PDUv.2.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2). No cloak.  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).
